recipe.title: Marshmallow Sauce
ingredients: 2 teaspoons powdered dried egg whites, such as Just Whites
instructions: Whisk together powdered egg whites and 2 tablespoons warm water in bowl of stand mixer until powder is dissolved. Add corn syrup, confectioners' sugar, and salt, and beat on high speed until thick and white, 5 minutes. Beat in vanilla. Thin marshmallow to a sauce by beating in remaining tablespoon warm water, or to taste.
